channel.title: Java on Life Deletion Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Life Deletion Guide

item.title: A Pragmatic Guide to Proxy IPs for Crawlers
item.description: Summary of proxyipcenter (by @virjar): a server that scrapes, de‑dupes, enriches, validates, and scores proxies; and a client that manages a per‑target pool for crawlers. See Chinese post for full details and JSON examples.
